alert.note: Alert for Davidson; Davie (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 11 at 8:27AM EST until January 12 at 12:31AM EST by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in North Carolina... Yadkin River At Yadkin College affecting Davidson and Davie Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Yadkin River at Yadkin College. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Minor flooding begins. There is flooding of mainly farmlands on both banks. At 21.0 feet, Lower level campsites at the Thousand Trails Preserve off US-64 begin to flood. At 23.0 feet, The upper campsites at the Thousand Trails Preserve off US-64 begin to flood. At 25.0 feet, Moderate flooding begins. Flooding may close Sowers Road near Linwood and Hollywood Drive at Grub Ferry Rd. A campground on Hannah Ferry Road is flooded. Flooding threatens the pumping station at Davidson, Incorporated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM EST Thursday the stage was 24.5 feet. - Bankfull stage is 18.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The river crested at 25.7 feet early this morning. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this afternoon and continue falling to 3.3 feet Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am EST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Mon Yadkin River Yadkin Colleg 18.0 24.5 Thu 8 am EST 6.6 4.9 6.9 3.8 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/rah/rivers. The next statement will be issued by this evening at 830 PM EST.
